column4: i am having problems with sudo apt-get install linux-dri-modules-`uname -r`
it is not finding anything for me, and it is necc for aiglx i guess
i have repos uptodate as far as i know, and added the repos from the aiglx page i am looking at
what are you saying? to apt-get that first?
the package name is linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)  not linux-dri-modules
all the stuff i have found says linux-dri-modules..
there is nothing about restricted modules, and that is already uptodate
what version of ubuntu are you running?
maybe my video card is not supported by aiglx
i hear that aiglx is the way to go though..
so possibly it is not avail for 200m yet?
apt-cache search linux-restricted-modules    then apt-cache search linux-dri-modules    linux-dri-modules is the wrong package name :]
